numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The NBA has the highest percentage in the graph.
3. The WNBA has the highest percentage in the graph.
4. I wonder why the percentage of players is much higher than the percentage of coaches.
5. I wonder why this difference exists.
6. This graph has little impact on my community.
7. I think that my community has an equal amount of diversity among players and coaches.
8. The graph shows that players have more diversity than coaches.
9. There should be an equal mix of diversity among players and coaches.
